long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The 1SimplePhone extension allows users to control their 1SimplePhone desk phone to place calls from a web page. The extension will automatically find numbers on a page and add a button which can either trigger the Dial action, or Dial Preview on the desk phone. An extension popup window provides additional features. This extension only works for 1SimplePhone business phone service customers.
